overview: After enduring a heart-wrenching breakup and experiencing a downward spiral in his career, a man reaches his breaking point. Overwhelmed by despair, he makes a life-altering decision. But instead of meeting his tragic fate, he is inexplicably transported to a captivating realm called Eden. In this enchanting dimension, he embarks on a journey of exploration, encountering the awe-inspiring beauty of nature and the joyous presence of vibrant creatures. As he immerses himself in this heavenly sanctuary, his perspective begins to shift, breathing new life into his spirit. But what lies ahead for him in this extraordinary realm of possibility?
title: Lost
